import Avatar from './avatar' import DateFormater from './date-formater' import CoverImage from './cover-image' import Link from 'next/link' import Author from '../types/author' type Props = { title: string coverImage: string date: string excerpt: string author: Author slug: string } const HeroPost = ({ title, coverImage, date, excerpt, author, slug, }: Props) => { console.log(author); return (

{title}

{excerpt}

) } export default HeroPost
